properties.title: Rugghubelhütte SAC
properties.description: A spacious mountain guest house, which in summer is easily accessible, also for children, by the Brunni cable car from Engelberg. Mule trekking offered by the nearby Brunnihütte is a special attraction for boys and girls alike. Well described climbing routes are available in the limestone faces north of the cabin. There are mountain hikes and col crossings in summer and winter. Many hikers like Rot Grätli, the col towards Bannalp.
